P

paddock - Variable in class entities.HorseJockey
The Paddock instance where this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey) will perform its actions.
paddock - Variable in class entities.Spectator
The Paddock instance where this Spectator will perform its actions.
Paddock - Class in hippodrome
Place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators.
Paddock(int, int) - Constructor for class hippodrome.Paddock
Creates a Paddock.
placeABet(int, int, int) - Method in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Changes the Spectator's state to Placing a Bet (PAB) and lets a Spectator place a bet onto the BettingCentre.
PLACING_A_BET - entities.SpectatorState
This is a blocking state with transition.
PLAYING_HOST_AT_THE_BAR - entities.BrokerState
This is the final Broker's state.
positionOnTrack - Variable in class hippodrome.rollfilm.HorseJockey
Current position on track of this pair Horse/Jockey.

Makes a snapshot of the entities at a given time.

Print the headers on a file as the teacher has asked.

Makes a snapshot of the race at a given time.

Makes a snapshot of the entities at a given time.
printHeaders() - Method in class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Print the headers of the log files.
printRaceLine() - Method in class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Makes a snapshot of the race at a given time.
probabilityToWin - Variable in class hippodrome.rollfilm.HorseJockey
Current probability to win of this pair Horse/Jockey.
proceedToPaddock() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Signal given by the last pair Horse/Jockey that arrives on Paddock, notifying the ControlCentre.waitForTheNextRace() of the Spectators.
proceedToPaddock(int) - Method in class hippodrome.Paddock
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Paddock (ATP) and waits for the last Spectator to arrive on Paddock on the Paddock.goCheckHorses(boolean) method.
proceedToStable() - Method in class hippodrome.Stable
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Stable (ATS).
proceedToStable(int) - Method in class hippodrome.Stable
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Stable (ATS) and waits till the current race is, in fact, the current race of the event which is about to start.
proceedToStartLine() - Method in class hippodrome.Paddock
Signal that the race is about to start, by a HorseJockey.
proceedToStartLine() - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Start Line (ATSL) and waits till the last startTheRace() is performed by the Broker.
